mapper.update:
update O_INTERNET_RENEW_DETAIL
RENEW_ID = #{renewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICCID_NUM = #{iccidNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SN_NUM = #{snNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERNET_CARD_NUM = #{internetCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_ACCOUNT_TIME = #{openAccountTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RENEW_WAY = #{renewWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFSET_AMT = #{offsetAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENEW_AMT = #{renewAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OUGHT_AMT = #{oughtAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REALITY_AMT = #{realityAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENEW_STATUS = #{renewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AG_DOC_DISTRICT = #{agDocDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AG_DOC_PRO = #{agDocPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUS_CONTACT_PERSON = #{busContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update O_INTERNET_RENEW_DETAIL set RENEW_ID = #{renewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICCID_NUM = #{iccidNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SN_NUM = #{snNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERNET_CARD_NUM = #{internetCardNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_ACCOUNT_TIME = #{openAccountTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RENEW_WAY = #{renewWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFSET_AMT = #{offsetAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENEW_AMT = #{renewAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OUGHT_AMT = #{oughtAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REALITY_AMT = #{realityAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENEW_STATUS = #{renewStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BUS_NUM = #{busNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_PLATFORM = #{busPlatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AG_DOC_DISTRICT = #{agDocDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AG_DOC_PRO = #{agDocPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_CONTACT_PERSON = #{busContactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
